Auto hide menu bar (Press Alt key to dis: メニューバーを自動的に隠す （Altキーを押すと表示）

Change the language from System Preferen: Change the language from System Preferences → Keyboard → Text → Spelling.
Copy Image URL: 画像の URL をコピー

It will be installed the next time you r: It will be installed the next time you restart the application.
